FTGLBitmapFont Class Reference

#include <FTGLBitmapFont.h>

Inheritance diagram for FTGLBitmapFont:

Detailed Description

FTGLBitmapFont is a specialisation of the FTFont class for handling Bitmap fonts.

See also:
FTFont
